_header: Know ere thou knit and then thou mayest slake
_description: A proverbial couplet on marriage included in a list of six (6621.7)

OxfBal354.Transcription:
Know or þou knyte & then þou mayst slakeYff þou
                    knyte or þou know than yt ys to late
OxfBal354.Note: In a collection of six proverbial couplets: 6621.7, 5794, 2662, 1433, 835, 3009.
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
